1111000000101010 0011100001100111 1 -> sum: 0010100010010010, cout: 1
0101101110001110 0000010100011111 0 -> sum: 0110000010101101, cout: 0
1010111111000011 0101110100101110 0 -> sum: 0000110011110001, cout: 1
0010010001000010 0011101010101010 1 -> sum: 0101111011101101, cout: 0
0110010010100100 0010101101110011 1 -> sum: 1001000000011000, cout: 0
1011101000100000 0100110011101010 0 -> sum: 0000011100001010, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
